scenario_text.value:
For them to disguise themselves as you,
Agumon... What a nasty trap.
Are you okay, Takuma? Need a break?

No, I’m okay, really... We have to look for
everyone.

I’m always by your side, mkay? So you don’t
gotta worry about a thing!

(I believe in you, Agumon. We won’t get
fooled by an illusion like that!)

Takuma! There’s someone over there! I can
sense it!

There’s still some fog over there... But no
problem, let’s go!
